title: Colorado's top infectious disease expert answers your COVID-19 vaccine questions
author: KMGH Channel 7
description: On Wednesday, we invited Michelle Barron, the medical director of infection control and prevention at UCHealth University of Colorado Hospital [and professor of medicine at CU School of Medicine], to talk about the vaccine and answer some of your concerns surrounding the two vaccines currently available to the public.
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: It's been almost a year since we've all lived with the novel coronavirus in one way or another. Fortunately, there is a light at the end of the tunnel, and it has come in the form of a vaccine. CU Anschutz Fitzsimons Building 13001
